mil5.2.2:1.2: ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, puna ca therena mālukyaputtena pañhaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi.
mil5.2.2:1.3: Eso kho, bhante nāgasena, pañho dvayanto ekantanissito bhavissati ajānanena vā guyhakaraṇena vā.
mil5.2.2:1.5: ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, tena hi therassa mālukyaputtassa ajānantena na byākataṃ.
mil5.2.2:1.6: Yadi jānantena na byākataṃ, tena hi atthi tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi.
mil5.2.2:1.7: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.2:2.1: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, abyākato ca therena mālukyaputtena pucchito pañho, tañca pana na ajānantena na guyhakaraṇena.
mil5.2.2:2.4: Ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho ṭhapanīyo pañhoti.
mil5.2.2:3.6: ‘viññāṇaṃ aniccan’ti ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho, ayaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:4.6: ‘aniccaṃ pana viññāṇan’ti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho, ayaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:5.2: ‘Kiṃ nu kho cakkhunā sabbaṃ vijānātī’ti ayaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:6.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti,
mil5.2.2:6.13: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti ṭhapanīyo pañho,
mil5.2.2:7.1: Bhagavā, mahārāja, therassa mālukyaputtassa taṃ ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na byākāsi.
mil5.2.2:7.3: Na tassa dīpanāya hetu vā kāraṇaṃ vā atthi, tasmā so pañho ṭhapanīyo.
